attributes.review: I died using this app 😤 it’s so scary!!! this app almost broke my phone and ruined my life. don’t get it!!! 😞
attributes.title: we have the power not you!!

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I’ve ever used. With Trump being a “jenius” I would assume he would make a good app but no! This app is absolute dirt. I would like to speak to the manager ! 😡
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app with the intention of supporting our great president but when I went into the chat to ask how I could support our great president Donald Trump said “you send?”
attributes.title: Terrible app *ASKED ME FOR NUDES*

attributes.review: I can’t understand how they could make such a horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD if only I could zero stars for this app.
attributes.title: Worst thing that ever happened to me

attributes.review: after downloading this app, it started malfunctioning VERY BADLY. the bugs in this app are HUGE. Everytime I log in it calls me a rapist. This app threatened to delete my TikTok. It’s a HORRIBLE application.
attributes.title: bad app

attributes.review: I thought I was going to love this app I had high hopes for it but when I opens the app I saw a big orange I am ver disappointed...TikTok is way better than this
attributes.title: I’m a savage

attributes.review: Was genuinely curious about the app to have a better understanding of what he hopes to achieve. It kept crashing, and I am not supportive of his policies and goals. 1 Star
attributes.title: Not a fan

attributes.review: Absolutely terrible, wouldn’t even open. It continued to crash.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Besides the fact that this is Donald Trumps app ✋🏽😔 it kept making my phone crash.
attributes.title: bad app, wouldn’t recommend

attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded. ever. in my entire life. full of misogynistic information. racist information. and the platform/app shouldn’t be available to any sort of people. i wish i could give 0 stars but 1 does it. trump, you’re a disgusting individual and a disgrace to the united states.
attributes.title: do not buy
